question:
[Lawrence] loves his uncle, [William]. [William] was so happy for his brother, [Larry], getting a promotion. [Dana] was mad at her son, [Kenneth]. She found he'd been stealing from her purse. [Ethel] and her husband [Larry] danced together at the party. [Gerald] took his favorite son [Joseph] to a baseball game where he caught a foul ball as a souvenir. [Gerald] and his brother [Lawrence] went to the park to play basketball. [Ethel] had picked her daughter [Leila] out the cutest new dress to wear on her birthday. [Ethel] and her mother [Dana] went to the mall to try on new clothes. [Ethel] has a daughter named [Leila]
Question: How is [Kenneth] related to [Joseph]?
